description: SAme error, could not connect to server.

Works great and lets me export to .mp3 audio files
The voice is easy to understand. There is occasional problems connecting to remote server.
Exactly what I was looking for.

Works fine on the Steam Deck.

It's main 2 codecs:
1. PicoTTS(+VoiceGen Enhanced version) and
2. StreamLabs(oh wait this is not a codec, it's a website!)

worked fine. Try typing "Steam Deck"(with or without quotations) and then press on the "Read!" button.

It will work just fine!

About Steam Remote Play, ok I do quite a non-standard config but I'm basically working here on this Steam Deck through "Steam remote play" and I added Dolphin(KDE file manager) as a non-steam game, but when I watch this app from this mode this app confines my clicking ability to a mini area to the top left and its zoomed in there too so I can't see the entire window at all, I see almost nothing. I have to work on it physically from my Steam Deck which to me is slower but oh well...that's life.
summary: Does what it is supposed to do

description: I have tried googles own extension services and this is easier and effective on Ubunto jelly 22.04. Pasting in what ive got to read has helped my drive 10 fold. This student thanks you!
